title: What should my mom learn this quarantine? Some new skill - Quora

response.answer_text: PATIENCE!!! To tolerate you all during lockdown at home when you guys are around her 24 x 7 and she still has to be sane, act sober and may be cook varieties of unreasonable demands that everyone at home might be troublin her with. On serious note Anything that interests her and she could learn through online tutorials like knitting, Baking, writing blogs,poetry etc.Flexible Yoga & Meditation to keep her fit - physically & mentally both.If she has penchant liking for drawing, sketching etc. She could try her hands onto that. You can assist, guide her if she needs your help.If she loves singing or Dancing….she could hone her skills using YouTube videos or may be ceate her own if she is already a singer and had given up due to marriage & upbringing you all responsibilities.
try lot of cooking to impress your daughter and your family tooo. and she would be praised and she gets lots of respect for the new tastes from family . . .happy respect …that makes us powerful .
